content.detailedDescription: The past 20-25 days i have seen lights in the sky appearing to have the same flight pattern as birds would...Sometimes flying in v like formations (up to seven at a time) i am a smoker so i often go outside and will gaze at the stars...I have never in my life seen anything like i have the past month.  i have been viewing the moving lights over the newport bay.  i have seen the lights moving in different directions most of the time along the coast in both directions.  some nights i will see maybe 10-15 sightings a nights in increments of about 2-5 minutes...While some nights i may only see 1 or none.  the lights appear to change speeds.  it is pretty much impossible to guess the speeds or distance of the lights because i see the lights at night and i can not see the figure of the object. i only see the lumination.  i have seen the lights at times change dirctions once i saw one flying alone make a u-turn and immediately following the turn the light vanished.  i would defenately say that the lights are within the atmosphere and sometimes the lights may appear very close while over the bay.  on occasion i will see 2 flying together as well.  now i can not say that what i am saying is alien, but i am having trouble identifying them.  1 out of 5 lights i see will appear to flash once or twice while in flight.  while visible i will see the lights in the sky for about 5-20 seconds. the best description i can give for the object would be that it looks like birds flying in the sky that give or reflect light from the belly area.  while it is day time i will look at the birds and there patterns to give me reference at night sometimes the lights at night seem to be moving much faster than the birds i will see during the day.  the hardest part i am having is explaining the light i see. i have never seen a bird emit light before.  the first time i saw it i immediately thought alien. i saw about 7-10 the first night.  it had my heart racing.  they seemed to move so fast...Maybe because they seemed farther away than they were...I dont know. i tried to video tape the events for two of the night but was unsuccessful the camera i was using was no where near capable of capturing the objects mostly because getting the object in focus at night while moving was impossible.  thats pretty much it...If anyone knows what it is i am seeing please let me know
content.summary: Many lights at night over 25+ days over newport beach

content.detailedDescription:
I was out about town shortly after completing a job interview.Just taking pictures of the beautiful scenery.It wasn't untill i returned home and downloaded the pics when i noticed an object in one of the photos,and then another.Im always watching the skys for "ufo's" and i can tell you in complete honesty that there "were no objects" in my field of view 
(other than the scenery) when i took the photos.No birds or planes.
photo 153 shows what appears to be an wedge shaped object moving from the right to the left.
photo 156 shows (?) it might be a bug.Very strange.
content.summary: Unrealized initial sightings

content.detailedDescription: Came out in picture taken after dark
content.summary: Strange dropa like object, phoenix

content.altitude: Treetop, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I decided to take a video of the area that i have been photographing and in one video i captured two flying throughout the video at high rates of speed and towards the end of the video they are shown flying off in the same direction.  i used a kodak easyshare c653 camera for all photos and these videos.  in the second video the ufo is in the first second or two flying west to east.  i didn't see the first ufo's in the first video until i uploaded it onto computer. i saw only a dark streak/blurr in the second one through my camera and actually had hoped that i caught it on video but thought initially it might be a bird. i uploaded it, using quicktime i then reduced the speed then enlarged it to see a disk/cylinder shaped object. using quicktime i found that i could pause the video and review it frame by frame.

  it is definitely disk shaped.  no noises other than my dogs are present. 
i really wish that someone would come to check this out because for over a week now almost every photo i take has these orb shaped objects and disk shaped objects in them and i don't have the proper equipment to film them well.
content.summary: I turned on the camera / video and started filming and there it went...

check it out!

I decided to take a video of the area that i have been photographing and in one video i captured two flying throughout the video at high rates of speed and towards the end of the video they are shown flying off in the same direction.  i used a kodak easyshare c653 camera for all photos and these videos.  in the second video the ufo is in the first second or two flying west to east.  i didn't see the first ufo's in the first video until i uploaded it onto computer. i saw only a dark streak/blurr in the second one through my camera and actually had hoped that i caught it on video but thought initially it might be a bird. i uploaded it, using quicktime i then reduced the speed then enlarged it to see a disk/cylinder shaped object. using quicktime i found that i could pause the video and review it frame by frame.

content.detailedDescription: There is a 50ft circular shape - chaning through diamond shaped and back to circular again above my friends house in yeovil/somerset, uk as i type. it is too dark to be photographed with his camera phone.
content.summary: 50ft circular object hovering over yeovil uk, changing into diamond shape

content.detailedDescription: I was hiking off the highway in wichita falls, about a mile or two from sheppard afb. saw the hawk flying against the wind right above me and it was almost stationery, so i decided to take a picture. by the time i got my camera out it had floated away from me, but still managed to snap this shot. i couldn't see the lcd screen in the daylight (it was about noon), so i used the viewfinder to line up the shot. i didn't see the object on the picture until later that day when i uploaded it to my pc. i do remember jets flying around earlier that morning, but at the actual time it was taken it was quiet. i took several shots in a row, but this was the only one that had a "bonus" on it. i have printed the photo & shown it to several people, but no one can identify what it is.
content.summary: Taking picture of hawk, didn't see object until i saw picture on pc

content.detailedDescription: For a week i have been taking random pictures of the sky over our neighborhood and in almost everyone i capture these round objects hovering in the air some are far away and some are close.  i can't see them until i magnify the photo with my zoom after taking the picture.  i have at least 8 pictures or more over the past 4 days with these objects in view. in one the objects are in a formation and they are dark on the bottom 3/4 of the sphere and shiny on the top 1/4.  i have a few above and below a passing airplane.  i also have some that appear to be disk shaped in front of clouds, above clouds , and below them.  all seem to be concentrated on this area near the appalachian trail in the background.
content.summary: Driving and taking random photos/ufo's hovering in sky

content.detailedDescription:
We went to cherry creek resivorlast last night june 15,2007 to fish and watch the stars.
at exactly 11:46 pm my husband and i both observed an object coming from the south headed northeastern at a fairly reasonable rate of speed much like you would think a plane would fly we both commented that it was higher in the sky than a plane would be but very much visible as it was blinking light in rows .....It seemed to be a cone shape or a triangle as the one light on the bottom would blink and go out then two above it would come on and blink and go out and then the three on the top would come on and blink and go off and it would start with the one light again and proceed to go through the two three one two three, they would bleed together with the brightness of the lights i found myself counting one two three one two three one two three as it blinked its way accross the night sky with no sound.
content.summary: Lights coming from southeast to northeast blinking there were three rows of lights we believe one on the bottom then two then three lights and it were higher than any plane i've seen

content.detailedDescription: It last about 5 mins like it was doing flips and hoovering and moving weird. its was moving very smooth and doing wierd flips
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: It was a round disc black but sides were a real shiny metal

content.detailedDescription: Description: it or they were way to brite and far to see the shape. they all met at one point , after which they seemed to form this triangle pattern. i saw one at first , followed it around city. it stopped at a point were it met up with 2 more lites. the object i followed then put out a very brite lite. after which it faded. then the next object put out a even brighter lite. then a couple of blinking lites showed up. i think there were 6 in all. when they met they all seemed to form this triangle pattern. i think there were 2 triangle patterns from 6 crafts. i have alot of ufo filmed by me right here now. i started filming aug 2nd 06. my first ufo encounter was on that day. 3 am aug 2nd a flashing strobe lite followed me home. i ran in and got my camera. i started filming. ever sence then ufos always come around. i have rods , ufos , and even aliens all taped by me , and all on film.
content.summary: Ufos very brite lites come togther forming triangle pattern

content.detailedDescription: From  my porch on the island of careneros i spotted a very clear and bright semi-circle of red lights around a central white light, tilted at an angle, to the south. it seemed as if the remainder of the circle was behind the foothills of the mainland. the red lights were blinking in a seemingly random pattern. the lights did not move. the area is jungle and i have never seen any light there before. i watched for about half an hour and when i checked again an hour later they were gone. my wife and i observed the lights with binoculars set on our porch railing. the clarity and the strength of the light was atypical of home or vehicle lighting and the scale of the separation of the lights suggests a large area perhaps several hundred feet. the brightness and clarity of the lights was what first attracted my attention. there was no noise.
content.summary: Semi-circle of red lights around a brighter white light
content.locationName: Bocas del Toro, Bocas del Toro

content.detailedDescription: I was driving north bound on i-25 just a couple of mile south of castle rock colorado.  traffic was only moving about 35 mph since there was an accident ahead.  i looked north toward the sest side of the hiway and saw a helicopter moving southward.  then i noticed a trapizoidal shaped object that at first seemed to be being towed by the helicopter.  the aircraft moved out of my view but the object behind it remained.  i could not really tell its size and the shape changed and appeared to glide like a bird and sort of hover.  at one point it looked like a bipalne, but i know a plane when i see one.  traffic was almost stop and go so i could only view it at short intervals.  after a couple of minutes it started to move upward and looked like an ink blot in the clear sky.  it ascended up toward a small cloud moving east.  it seemed to stop and then shot downward toward the horizon in a north easrsterly direction at a high rate of speed until it disapeared as a black dot.  i have nevr saw anything move the way this thing did.  the sky was clear and the object was only at about 30 degrees.  there must be others who saw this.  it was so plain to see, especially for the fact that it came up behind the helicopter which would have drawn someones ele's eye to it as well
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It frst looked like a kite with a trapaziodal shape then appeared to glide like an eagle and hover.  it was dark in appearance,

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my second story living room looking out through
a sliding door window at the afternoon sky on june 9th 2007 or
possibly june 10th 2007 when i noticed a very shiny object moving in
the sky slowly like a helicopter.  i was looking north east over
the port of galveston and it moved in a straight path upwards
and to the side (i can't remember if it was right or left).
its cross section was like a perfectly level and symmetrical
trapezoid and i had the feeling it might be a cylinder with
a vertical axis and the top diameter about 20% smaller than
the bottom diameter.  i watched it about 3 or 4 minutes
skeptically until i finally decided to get my camera to take a
look through the zoom lens.  by the time i got back with my camera
i couldn't see the object.  its cross section was very small
like an aspirin at arm's length or even smaller.
i didn't have much of a reaction to the sighting other than
casual interest like "that sure is weird looking".
content.summary: Tapered cylinder or trapezoid very small in daylight

content.detailedDescription: I was outside my apt off tropicana and boulder hwy..I was talking to a friend on the phone watching a black widow male try to mate..I looked up in the sky and a light moved very fast, making 90 degree turns with incredible speed and precision. i even narrated it to my friend while i talked to her. it made about 6 90 degrees turns and then took off into the direction of the big dipper, and dissappeared.
content.summary: Bright light moving eraticly across the sky

content.detailedDescription: As usual my husband and i were on our patio viewing the stars.  it was about 9:45 pm. all of the sudden as we have seen many times a star-like object was spotted moving south at a high rate of speed at a very high elevation mostlikly in space we assumed. as the object became in the southern area of view we noticed a plane that was flying very high in the western direction and as the object passed in front of and just seemingly higher altitude above the plane, the lights from the plane shined on the object seemed to alumintate it, i believe the object had been close enough to reflect the light from the airplane, i also wonder if the pilot saw it.
content.summary: Star-like moving southward at a hight rate of speed from center of sky seemingly to near miss a plane which was headed west

content.detailedDescription:
I and one other person witnessed anomalous lights from near gulf shores, al on june 6, 2007 at approximately 2200 central time. the lights were observed in the wsw at approximately 35 degrees above the horizon while i and one other person were stargazing. the lights initially appeared as three separate lights horizontally level in relation to each other. i was able to observe the lights through binoculars and and each individual light appeared to be two separate rectangular lights spaced closely together. i was also able to discern a third, faint, strobing light near the two rectangular lights. when the lights faded out the rectangular light on the right went out followed immediately by the rectangular light on the left. the lights apparent size was that of pea held at arms length. it was impossible to estimate the altitude or the actual size of the lights. no noise was heard, however the sound of the surf would almost definitely masked the sound of any distant aircraft. at the time i thought that they were possibly the exhaust of jet fighter aircraft as the aircraft were flying at level flight at an angle directly away from my position, however the lights reappeared three or four times in approximately the same position over a period of several minutes. this, in my mind, rules out that hypothesis.
	a few minutes later, a single light appeared slightly to the south of the original lights at roughly the same angle above the horizon. the light remained stationary for approximately 2 seconds and then expelled a similar light from the left (my left) which quickly descended approximately three times the width of the original light as if it were in free fall then both lights faded out simultaneously. initially, i thought that this might have been a flare dropped from an aircraft, however the short duration of the light is not a characteristic of a military-type flare. one or two minutes later another similar light appeared in roughly the same position as the one previously described. about one second after it appeared the light seemed to streak to my left (east) a short distance and then quickly faded out. when the object moved it produced streaks of light behind it (opposite the direction of travel). that marked the end of the observation. nothing further was observed. afterwards, the other witness and i discussed the possible explanations of what we had just seen. we considered the possibilities mentioned above, meteorites and space junk reentering the atmosphere. however, we concluded that none of these possibilities could adequately explain what was observed. we both agreed that what we witnessed was unlike anything ever observed by either of us.
	i am a captain in the army with 18 years of service, have served in combat and i have a b.S. in geology. the other witness has served in the military, is a combat veteran and has a degree in and currently practices law. 

one last note: there is a report on the nuforc website of a similar sighting from the same area on the same date and time. i have also reported the sighting to their website.
content.summary: Anomalous lights near gulf shores, al

content.detailedDescription:
I reported this incident to your network two years ago.  that is when i first noticed this object.  though the light did disappear for a few months last year, it has returned.  everynight it appears around dusk in the north western sky of cincinnati, oh.  it is always the brightest light in the sky.  it first appears high in the sky and slowly descends behind the horizon.  it takes about 2 1/2 hours to make this journey.  it's the same thing everynight for the last two years, besides those few months when it was not there.  one time, however, i did see it do something differnet from it's normal course.  a few weeks after first spotting the bright light, i walked outside as usual to watch "my light" as i have come to call it.  it was around 20 minutes from dipping behind the horizon.  not even a minute after sitting down and gazing at "my light", it increased it's brightness for a second or two, then returned to it's normal brightness.  it then proceeded to move off to the east, taking it's time.  after about 20 seconds it disappeared from my field of view.  this proved to me, "my light" is not a planet or star.  i admit, it could be a sattelite, but i don't think so.  i have showed the light to numerous people, and no one has any explanation as to what the hell this thing could be.  i showed it to a buddy of mine, who used to work at our local airport, and he shrugged it off as a plane coming in for landing.  he's not into paranormal stuff, so he refused to watch the light with me as it slowly descended.  he had more important stuff to do. i'll admit 'my light" does resemble a huge airplane light, but that it is not.  all i want to know is what this thing is and i figure your network would be the best place to get my question answered.  thank you for your time.

p.S.  about a year and a half ago, i was in north carolina, and there was "my light"  visible in the night sky.
content.summary: I first noticed this object on a walk  and was instantly curious on what it was.

content.detailedDescription:
I haven���t shown very many people this video. for starters, it scared me when it happened and i am still a little confused as to what it was.

the first of the video has something in it at about 5-10 seconds. call it a rod, call it a bug��� i don���t know. i do know that i have taken about 4 videos of very strange fast moving (bug like) objects. i will attach another video of what i mean.

now skip forward to 1:15 in the video. sorry for the long delay but i wanted to show that the ���rod��� was captured in the same video. i am still an amateur, using a new camera. i wish i would have spent more time on trying to video what i was seeing but you will still see what happened. i was filming to the northeast on friday april 13th about midnight. there was a strange feeling in the air that night. from a distance appeared 15-20 lights moving from east to west. these object were illuminated some how. they were not birds and they were defiantly not bugs on any type. when trying to adjust my camera i clicked off the inferred button. by the time i get readjusted, you can see the objects almost directly north of my home. another fast moving object passes by flying south to north.

wish i new what they were. hsibilly@hotmail.Com
content.summary: Phoenix 10-15 lights unknown

I got a screen capture over camelback mountains in phoenix arizona on june 11, 2007 of 2 objects. 

johnny wheeler

content.detailedDescription:
Attached is a 5 megapixel digital photo taken in vischer ferry, ny near the mohawk river. the coordinates are 42 degrees 48' 9" north and 73 degrees 50' 31" west. it was on may 15, at 10:10 am. i was just taking a picture of the dam.
the ufo can be seen in the upper right-hand corner of photo 1. photo 2 is a blown-up picture of the object. i only noticed the object after i got home and checked it out on the computer. you tell me what it was, because i don't know!

the dam in the photo is a hydro-electric powerplant.
content.summary: I didn't see the ufo until i got home and looked at it on the computer

content.detailedDescription:
Hoy a las 7 con 17 minutos observe en el cielo un objeto no identificado que aparecio de repente mientras tratava de filmar un objeto obscuro y raro que aparecio de se dirigiendose para el sw y como no podia enfocarlo bien decidi tomar unas tomas al avion para enfocar el lente y esto fue lo que sucedio un ovni decendio hacia el avion se le puso en frente y luego con una rapidez enorme se dirigio a la parte de atras asta que vajo y de ai se perdio. si no lo puede ver bien por fabor, ponga el zice de su windows media player a 100 y en velocidad lenta para poderlo observar si aun no lo puede ver pongale pausa frame to frame y lo vera.
ovjeto visto el dia 12/6/07. por nl.
content.summary: Ufo jugando con el avion de propulsion.

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing on the 3 story deck of my friend's townhouse, and i was talking to her when over her head to the southwest in the sky appeared an oval ring of bright blue light that appeared out of nowhere and stayed visible for a few seconds and then disappeared in front of my eyes.  it was a very clear and cool night.  we had gone out on the deck to just chat and stargaze before we went to sleep. the deck is three 12 foot ceiling high stories and the townhouse sits on a hill with a big view of the sky and rooftops below.  there is a "hill" behind us with tall evergreen trees and beyond that is farmland. we are up pretty high.
we had just been looking at a bright star (probably a planet), and the object appeared about 10 minutes later above and to the right of the bright star or planet we had just been looking at before i saw the object.  i grabbed my friend's arm and said..."oh my god! what the hell was that!?" and she said, she saw a flash of light out of her peripheral vision to the right of her.  she's been a ufo buff for about 35 years, and i have thought it was all kind of a bunchy of hooey, but it also scares me the things she tells me she reads about, but i don't want to believe it.  when i saw this bright oval light appear out of nowhere and then disappear again, it made a believer out of me!!!  my friend said she was jealous she didn't see it, but only saw what she described as "like a flashbulb going off in the sky behind me".  i know what i saw, and it was an oval ring of blue light with a dark hole center.  it had no tail or trail like a shooting star or a comet.  it made no noise.  it was just there, and then it wasn't there, and it was so bright and blue and such a weird shape against everything else in the clear night sky.  this was no ordinary or natural light in the sky and no reason for it to just appear.  it didn't come from a direction or leave in a direction.  it was just there, and then gone a few seconds after i saw it.  just long enough to scare the heck out of me, and freak me out.  i had nightmares about it that night, and i couldn't get to sleep for the longest time. my friend laughed and told me not to be scared of ufo's or aliens, because she said if they wanted to harm us, they'd have done it ages ago!  i am still scared after seeing that! i'm not going anywhere without my camera now!
content.summary: Bright neon blue ring of light flashed high in the sky for a few seconds

content.detailedDescription:
i awoke on the morning of june 9, 2007 at 4:58 am to go to the bathroom.
i walked into the bathroom and did not turn on the light as something caught my attention through the window. i could see bright lights through the limbs of a very tall tree. it is very easy to see through this tree.
 the object was  about 150 feet (approx) from my window and moving very slow north. i noticed there were two flashing white lights on the back of the ship and each time they flashed i could see they were round. i could tell the shape of the back the best and it was shaped like a boomerang. there were light panels all over this craft.I could also see a seperation or space between the panels. it was lit up so much i could not tell if the craft was round or pointed at the front. the bottom was flat, the back was pointed, i could see a shape on top that slanted down toward the front. 
   i was trying to figure out what i was looking at, trying to make sense of this. planes can not go this slow, planes have red and green lights. planes make alot of noise. helicopters make more noise than a plane, i was trying hard to make sense of what i was looking at. 
   i did not see any red or green flashing lights. i also did not hear any sound of a engine. but there was a a/c unit running in the bedroom.
 i watched the craft fly slowly northward from behind the tree, into a clear area with no limb abstructions. the craft continued moving very slow northward a short distance then was just above the white pines on the other side of my driveway. at this time it went out of sight, only because it was just above the tree tops. if it would of been higher i could of seen it longer. i observed all i could for the time i had.
  since i have seen this i have felt different. it is hard to explain, but because it did not fit into anything i know, then what do i say it was? i have not told my kids yet, and do not know if i should. there young and am afraid they would be scarded.
content.summary: Slow moving object (4mph) with many white lights, 2 white lights blinking on back , about  80 feet off the ground. flying north just over trees.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside my company's building, in the parking lot, just after a thunderstorm, photographing cloud formations and lightning. as the cloud masses began to break up, i spotted a small, silver/white sphere moving in a slightly irregular path eastward over lawrenceville, nj toward the pennsylvania border and delaware river. it was very striking against the clear blue of the sky between the cumulus clouds.

i noticed right away that this was an atypical object.

the object moved fairly swiftly, jogging slightly left to right as it flew in the bright blue sky between two cloud masses that were breaking up. the apparent altitude was approximately that of personal, single-engine aircraft, not extremely high. no sound or contrail was evident. there were other commonly identified aircraft in the air at the time, well away from this object, and were a good visual reference.

i remember being calm, but very interested, and happy that i had my camera with me.

this object was highly irregular in its outline to my fairly well-trained eyes; clearly not an airplane configuration that i am familiar with. there were several witnesses to the event with me, and they all agreed that it was a very strange-looking object, with an atypical flight path. the object was finally obscured by more cumulus clouds, the entire sighting lasting about 20 seconds.

i snapped 7 photos of the event with my nikon d40 dlsr, using a nikon 18-55mm af-s lens. unfortunately, i didn't have my 55-200mm telephoto on the camera at the time, or the image would be much more informative.

i have enclosed the best photo that i have, with blow-ups done in photoshop cs3 on a mac pro computer.
content.summary: Post-thunderstorm silver/white sphere moved irregularly through blue sky between cloud masses

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were swimming in the backyard when i noticed an object in the sky and just like the other report from the person in toledo it looked like a star or planet out of place which is why it caught my attention to begin with.It started as clouds were passing and as they passed this one object remained.My husband insisted it was a plane or a star but it was moving across the sky and then just remained in one spot for about 2-3 minutes.But as it floated there you could see where it would (at least that's how it seemed) to divide into 2 separate objects and then return to one. i saw that happened twice. during this time an airplane took off from our local airport  flying over us taking away any doubts that the unidentified object might have been an aircraft.My daughter had ran in to get her video camera but as much as each of us tried to focus in on it, the object would not show up on camera. we could see it with our own eyes but when we looked through the camera the object could not be seen.My daughter tried, my husband tried, and i tried but nothing. then another aircraft went by close  to the objects i don't know what they're called but we see those often, the ones that leave that smoke trail behind.Anyway as that passed before it got close to the object the object flat out disappeared.I did not see it move in any direction just simply disappear from sight.At this point there were no clouds anywhere near it to have hidden in.It was a clear blue evening.I don't know what it was i saw, maybe there is an explanation for it,and we do have an airforce base nearby but i've never seen any aircraft move like this.By the way, i'm not a member i'm not even one who goes out looking for these kind of incidents so my own sake can anyone tell me if they've seen anything like this in the del rio area or if there is an explanation please share ?
content.summary: A star-like almost object appeared and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Looking at the the night sky at approx. 9:15 pm in the se direwction just to the right of a big star.  the light would move in all directions, separate into pieces and then come back together.  the object stayed for a long time, over 30 minutes.  there seemed to be more than opne of these objects, moving very rapidly in all directions.  i could see the planes going to lax airport undermneath the ufo.
content.summary: To the right of a big star, this light looked like a sparler.  pieces would go in all directions, shoot up  then return

content.detailedDescription:
My two friends and i were camping for the night in jawbone canyon of the mojave desert.  i had brought my telescope and we had just viewed saturn, venus and jupiter as well as some deep sky objects.  the sky was clear and the moon was not up.

there were two somewhat unusual events preceding the actual sighting that i will include in this account.

first, somewhere around 10:00pm 6/9/07 we noticed unusual bright strobe-like flashes coming from the southern horizon.  we could not see the actual source of the light, only the glow in the sky.  this happened at least three times.

later that evening, i caught a glimpse of something in the northern sky that appeared like a shooting star that traveled about a quarters diameter held at arm's length.  it then stopped and shot off as a red streak at a new angle so that the entire flight path resembled a v with the object coming in from the top left, stopping as a 'star' at the bottom of the v then accelerating like a red laser to the top right and disappearing.

because the event happened so fast i was not able to look directly at the object and only made a passing comment to my friends that i had seen something odd.

around 12:20am sunday morning, something relatively high in the northern sky pulsed with a very bright white light (out-shining even venus).  the pulse was bright enough for all three of us to see it peripherally and train our gaze on it.

the object appeared stationary and as the initial pulse faded, the center of the object became a very red point of light enveloped in white light.  within one second, this point of red light began emitting 'beams' of red and white laser-like light (mostly white beams, i only saw one red beam).  these beams came to a stop as tiny white points of light.  these 'baby' stars (at least four or five of them) then began to pulse very bright white light all around the 'mother' star until all faded and the portion of the sky became ordinary again.

again, all this took place within an area of the sky that could be covered with a quarter at arms length.  this was also quite possibly the exact same location of the first object i saw.

the impression was that the object/objects were very far away, at least outside the atmosphere.  one friend thought it may have been a star exploding into tiny pieces (though i explained that supernovas are very rare and probably could not be seen with the naked eye).  i had absolutely no idea what it could be.  i have observed the night sky for years.  i have seen satellites, planets, space stations, rockets, you name it.  whatever this was, it was very unusual.

i was sure that the 'mother' star was still visible but back to a normal subdued radiance.  i grabbed the celestron 'sky scout' and determined that the star in question was polaris, the north star.

i was certain that the performance would repeat, and i stayed up for at least another half hour watching the same place in the sky but the desert air was dry and windy, my contacts began to bother me and eventually i had to close my eyes and sleep.
content.summary: 'star' pulses extremely bright white light, then red light, then shoots out beams

content.detailedDescription:
a lazy night of television watching was interrupted when i heard a loud plane flying outside my window.  i tried to ignore the sound until several minutes had passed and it still had not subsided.  i decided to investigate and went out on my 2nd floor balcony, which faces northwest, only to find nothing within my viewing range and the sound fading to nothing.  directly across from my balcony is another condo complex, approximately 75-100 feet away.  the two run parallel and there is a long grassy lane that runs between them.  i have a good view of the northwest sky and an extremely bright star (i���m not sure what it���s called, but it isn���t the north star because it moves beyond my viewing area late at night.)

     i decided to smoke a cigarette while i was outside, and after several minutes i could see two objects in the distance, which i thought were planes because i could see red and white lights.  i continued to smoke until i noticed that the lights were closer and appeared to be much lower in the sky than i originally thought.  i watched the lights move toward me, to the south, and when the closest one broke the plane of the twilight i could see a silhouette of a black sphere shape with 4-5 lights on it.  i did not hear any sound or see any headlights or green lights, and i my adrenaline was pumping as i tried to make sense of what i was seeing.  i live near sfo airport, so planes are regularly flying overhead.  i then noticed that the second set of lights also appeared to be on a sphere shaped craft and both craft were flying in the same direction at aproximately the same altitude.  i watched as both craft appeared to fly in a straight line due south until they passed out of my view.

     as i lit up another cigarette, i reflected on what had occurred and attempted to logically explain what i had seen.  not even two minutes later, something else caught my eye further north.  a triangular craft that appeared to be slightly larger than the spheres came into view from behind a tree.  it looked black (but it was difficult to tell with the twilight fading) and it had the same red and white lights, but the white lights seemed to be arranged in a rectangle from my viewpoint.  i didn���t notice any sound, although i may have been too distracted to notice.  i watched it head slowly toward the direction of the two spheres flight path.  as it passed out of view, i frantically tried to call friends that lived south of me, but none of them picked up.

     i genuinely hope that someone else saw this or can explain what i did see, because after talking with my friends, i know that i won���t be able to talk to people about this without some kind of corroboration.  i have no photos and no other witnesses, just an unbelievable story.  all i can do is post this everywhere in the hopes that someone can verify what i saw.
content.summary: Two spheres and a triangle, all with several red and white lights.
